morepeople.android.app.interfaces

Interface ICoreStateHandler


  • public interface ICoreStateHandler
    Handles state transfers in terms of the morepeople protocol.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEnterStateListener(UserState observedState, IDataCallback onEnterState)
      Add a listener to the "onEnter" event of the according state.
      UserState getCurrentState() 
      void removeEnterStateListener(UserState observedState, IDataCallback onEnterState)
      Remove a listener.
      void transferToState(UserState newState, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
      Enter the new state.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentState

        UserState getCurrentState()
        Returns:
        the current state of the user.

      • transferToState

        void transferToState(UserState newState,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
        Enter the new state. Listeners will be called.
        Parameters:
        newState - the new state to enter.
        data - data returned by the server.

      • addEnterStateListener

        void addEnterStateListener(UserState observedState,
                         IDataCallback onEnterState)
        Add a listener to the "onEnter" event of the according state.
        Parameters:
        observedState - the state which will be observed.
        onEnterState - will be called whenever the user enters this state.

      • removeEnterStateListener

        void removeEnterStateListener(UserState observedState,
                            IDataCallback onEnterState)
        Remove a listener.
        Parameters:
        observedState - the state which had been observed.
        onEnterState - the listener to remove.
